page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: { DEATH WALL { This a game which quite a few people can play at a time. First you get a ball and stand about five yards away from the wall and let people run across in front of the wall.When they get half way you throw the ball at them and if you miss them they stand at the other side of the wall.You repeat this for each person who is playing. If when you throw the ball it hits them above the knees and below the face then that person sits out of the game until everyone else is hit and then the game starts again with somebody else throwing the ball.
